definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="192" y="112"><field name="trigger">chat_sent</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="item_is_cooldown"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PublicClamor</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PublicClamor</field></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PublicClamor</field></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2400</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
